file_content.text: This is very interesting technology. I wonder where these ruffians acquired it...?
The droids are out of commission.
And you have their transmitters?
Excellent. Our scientists will begin reverse-engineering them immediately.
You have more than earned your pay.
I appreciate your aid, my lord.
Thank you for your assistance.
We are all in danger from those assassin droids as long as their stealth technology remains operational.
I don't advise traveling openly here.
I'm sure you can all watch each other's backs, but I don't want you heading out blind.
I'm certain you're on business far above my clearance, my lord. But I wouldn't want you to risk yourself unnecessarily.
I don't know if I'm the first you're hearing this from, but consider yourself warned.
The local Exchange here are backed by someone with advanced stealth technology. They're using assassin droids to ambush our men.
They send a few droids out and you're willing to write off this whole place?
So you're just giving up?
No, my lord!
If we could see the droids, my men would make short work of them.
What kind of technology?
So what?
We cannot let this rabble have a military advantage.
This technology renders the droids invisible to the eye and to our instruments. You could be next to one and not know until it was too late.
My science officer developed a way to counteract the technology... if we could just get close enough to use it.
I will help.
Your involvement would guarantee a favorable outcome.
Is this a favor or a job?
If you can retrieve this technology, I will pay full market value.
What's stopping you?
The droids have proven nearly impossible to fight while the stealth generator is working.
To destroy them, you will have to disable their stealth generators with this visual descrambler.
Any hidden droids should appear. Once they're dealt with, inspect the chassis to find the stealth transmitters. Our scientists will need to examine them.
Don't ask me. [Refuse quest]
Then just... remember I warned you.
This is a secured area. Enter at your own risk.
